meanings.definition: The hollow beneath the junction of the arm and shoulder.
meanings.sent1: She felt sweat in her armpit after playing outside.
meanings.sent2: He raised his hand, revealing a clean armpit.
meanings.sent3: The deodorant spray tickled her armpit, making her giggle.
meanings.sent4: The armpit of the city was bustling with activity.
meanings.sent5: The mosquito buzzed around her armpit, looking for a place to land.

meanings.definition: A place of intense heat or activity.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen was an armpit during the summer heat.
meanings.sent2: The factory floor was an armpit of noise and movement.
meanings.sent3: The concert venue turned into an armpit of excitement and energy.
meanings.sent4: The armpit of the desert was scorching hot.
meanings.sent5: The meeting room became an armpit of tension and stress.
